recipesJson.name: Freezy Apple
recipesJson.author: Kau_barros
recipesJson.description:
A friend dared me to get to a minty apple hardcandy.
This is my trial.
Why kiwi? Not that it’s not a good pair with the apple profile. It’s just that CAP kiwi always reminded me more of a pear then a kiwi. In this mix it works that way, to soften a bit the Fuji. If you don’t have (cause it’s not much used), 1% marshmallow worked well and made it fluffiest.

I didn’t put it, cause the challenge was making only fruit and mint. 

Hope you MintAddicted enjoy this one! 

Lots of love and flavor <3
